Package cea.streamer.algs

Class MLalgorithms

java.lang.Object
cea.streamer.algs.MLalgorithms
Direct Known Subclasses:
Clustering, HoeffdingTreeClassifier, NeuralNetwork, SVM, XGBoost
public abstract class MLalgorithms
extends java.lang.Object
Interface class that implements the algorithm module (machine learning models and statistic algorithm). Each algorithm has to implement a test and a learn method

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    boolean updateModel
    This attribute is used to avoid storing the data in case of online learning algorithms.

  • Field Details

    • updateModel

      public boolean updateModel
      This attribute is used to avoid storing the data in case of online learning algorithms. When the model is updated, the data is not needed anymore in the next training phase.

  • Constructor Details

    • MLalgorithms

      public MLalgorithms()

  • Method Details

    • learn

      public abstract void learn​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> data, java.lang.String id)
      Train (construct) the ML model
      Parameters:
      data - vector of time records that the ML algorithm uses to learn
      unique - identifier of the process

    • run

      public void run​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> data, java.lang.String id)
      Test the ML model
      Parameters:
      data - vector of time records that the ML algorithm uses to test
      unique - identifier of the process

    • listNeededHyperparams

      public java.lang.String listNeededHyperparams()
      List hyperparams need for the algorithm
      Returns:

    • isUpdateModel

      public boolean isUpdateModel()
      Get attribute updateModel. This attribute is used to avoid storing the data in case of online learning algorithms. When the model is updated, the data is not needed anymore in the next training phase (it will be erased from the DB).
      Returns:
      updateModel (true or false)

    • setUpdateModel

      public void setUpdateModel​(boolean updateModel)
      Set attribute updateModel. This attribute is used to avoid storing the data in case of online learning algorithms. When the model is updated, the data is not needed anymore in the next training phase.
      Parameters:
      updateModel - (true or false)
